issue.title: [Plasma] Reduce number of IPCs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3958](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3958). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we ship file descriptors of objects from the store to the client every time an object is created or gotten. There is relatively few distinct file descriptors, so caching them can get rid of one IPC in the majority of cases.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3958?focusedCommentId=16720683) by Robert Nishihara (robertnishihara):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3124
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3124>
